<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"> <sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <abort_action>false</abort_action> <access>package_private</access> <action_delete>true</action_delete> <action_insert>false</action_insert> <action_query>false</action_query> <action_update>false</action_update> <active>true</active> <add_message>false</add_message> <advanced>true</advanced> <change_fields>false</change_fields> <client_callable>false</client_callable> <collection>itfm_budget_target</collection> <condition/> <description/> <execute_function>false</execute_function> <filter_condition/> <is_rest>false</is_rest> <message/> <name>Delete Target on Plans Yearly Details</name> <order>100</order> <priority>100</priority> <rest_method/> <rest_method_text/> <rest_service/> <rest_service_text/> <rest_variables/> <role_conditions/> <script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*undefined when async or display*/) {
var _planningConstants = new ITFM_Planning_Constants();
var planYearlyDetailTable = _planningConstants.planYearlyDetailTable;
var planYearlyDetailGR = new GlideRecord(planYearlyDetailTable.tableName); planYearlyDetailGR.addQuery(planYearlyDetailTable.budgetTarget, current.getUniqueValue()); if(!planYearlyDetailGR.canWrite()){ gs.addErrorMessage(gs.getMessage('Cannot update Plan Yearly Details')); } else{ planYearlyDetailGR.setValue(planYearlyDetailTable.budgetTarget, 'NULL'); planYearlyDetailGR.setWorkflow(false); planYearlyDetailGR.updateMultiple(); }
})(current, typeof previous != 'undefined' ? previous : null);]]></script> <sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name> <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by> <sys_created_on>2015-08-04 17:15:46</sys_created_on> <sys_domain>global</sys_domain> <sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path> <sys_id>08e43ae3ff2102005298ffffffffffd2</sys_id> <sys_mod_count>3</sys_mod_count> <sys_name>Delete Target on Plans Yearly Details</sys_name> <sys_overrides/> <sys_package display_value="Financial Planning Core" source="com.snc.financial_planning">0e10166b47e64210cd4e1ce4316d4326</sys_package> <sys_policy/> <sys_scope display_value="Global">global</sys_scope> <sys_update_name>sys_script_08e43ae3ff2102005298ffffffffffd2</sys_update_name> <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by> <sys_updated_on>2017-08-16 09:51:49</sys_updated_on> <template/> <when>before</when> </sys_script> <sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=08e43ae3ff2102005298ffffffffffd2"/> </record_update>
